Entry.JapaneseText: うわっ、<Veigue>さん、 なんか難しそうな本読んでますね！
Entry.EnglishText: Wow, <Veigue>, it looks like you're reading a rather complicated book!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……荷物の中に入っていた哲学書だ。 暇つぶしに読もうと思ってな……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... It's a philosophy book that was in my belongings. I thought I could read it to kill time...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、難しすぎて、 よくわからなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: But it's really complicated, so I don't get it at all.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一応、暇つぶしにはなったみたいですね……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that it is helping you pass the time just fine, then.
